isis.stitle: 530 and DT-466/408 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - EGED-115 DIAGNOSTIC ANALYSIS GUIDE FOR THE INTERNATIONAL(r) 530 and DT-408/466 DIESEL ENGINES WITH ROBERT BOSCH "P" INJECTION PUMP [FRONT SIDE] - INTAKE AND EXHAUST VALVE CLEARANCE

entry.para: INSTRUMENT GUIDELINE DATA 1 st Check 2 nd Check

note.para: All valves are adjusted by rotating the engine only twice.

step1.para: Rotate the crankshaft until the #1 piston is on the compression stroke and the timing mark on the damper pulley is aligned with the ''TDC'' mark on the timing indicator.

note.para: Confirm that the #1 piston is on the compression stroke by turning both push rods by hand to verify that both valves are closed. The valves are closed when the push rods are loose and can be turned easily.

step1.para: Set valve lash by loosening the locknut and turning the valve adjustment screw with the appropriate size feeler gauge inserted between the rocker arm and valve stem tip. Tighten the valve adjustment screw until the valve lever can support the feeler gauge. Refer to Figure 5.28.

para.emph: * - Form specified with latest revision.

step1.para: Tighten the locknut once the valve adjustment is set. Remove the feeler gauge. Refer to Figure 5.29.

figure.caption: Figure 5.29 Tighten Valve Adjustment Screw Locknut

step1.para:
Six valves are adjusted when the #1 piston is at ''TDC'' (compression) and the remaining six are adjusted when the #6 piston is at ''TDC'' (compression). Refer to Figure 5.30
.

Install the valve cover/intake manifold on the cylinder head. Tighten the mounting bolts to 13 lbf-in.(17 N.m). Refer to Figure 5.31
.

note.para: Be sure valve cover/intake manifold gasket is aligned before tightening.

svcsubproc.title: DT 408/150 HP @ 2600 RPM w/Bowden Wire Shut-off or Electric Shut-off
svcsubproc.para: [50 State 1993 Model Year]

entry.para: Injection Pump Part Number Original Equipment
Injection Nozzle Part Number Original Equipment
Nozzle Valve Opening Pressure New or Reconditioned
Nozzle Valve Minimum Opening Pressure Before Replacement
Intake and Exhaust Valve Clearance (Engine Off - Hot or Cold)
Air Cleaner Restriction * [Measured @ Air Cleaner Outlet]
(Check at Full Load, Rated Speed) - Max
Fuel Pressure [Minimum] * - at High Idle [No Load])
Fuel Inlet Restriction [Maximum] * - at High Idle [No Load])
Crankcase Pressure [Maximum] * - at High Idle [No Load])

para.emph: The Following Data To Be Taken At Full Load, Full Throttle Rated Engine Speed on Chassis Dynamometer or on Highway.

svcsubproc.para: Measure water temperature differential across the radiator with engine on a chassis dynamometer, at full load and ambient temperature of 80° F or above.

para.emph: The following data to be taken after engine reaches stabilized operating temperature.

entry.para: Lube Oil Pressure at Operating Temperature

para.emph: * - Engine must be at normal operating temperature.
** - Crankcase pressure [maximum] as measured with Orificed Restrictor Tool ZTSE-4039.
